values:
Sometimes I wish I could tell certain people to sod off. But I suppose I can do it unofficially.


Sod off. You know who you bloody are.

Right, so, rumors are going around. People are saying that Gayles is getting sacked, or rather, retiring against his own will. Does this mean a promotion is coming? And to who? Cross your fingers, ladies and gents.

What should I do with myself? I'm rather unsure.

[Private to Ron and Ginny] Do either of you know where Mum and Dad are? The Burrow or the headquarters?[/private]

Alright, so I've gotten all of my work done for today and I am now sitting in my office wondering what to do now. No where to go. I'd write to Penelope except I am rather certain she is on vacation and would write to me if she wanted me to bother her. Mm... So I'm... bored, actually.

So this is what it is like to have nothing to do. I miss studying.
